speaker: Archives Colonnade
lines: You walk the archive colonnade under stone columns.
Busts of past Deans line the niches.
A posted list shows banned tomes.
Footsteps are quiet in this hall.
A maintenance mage adjusts a lantern.
A door to the Restricted stacks is barred by runes.
If you have earned access, the runes may allow it.

choices.text: Try the latch when no one looks.
